Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for enemy behavior and collision.

EnemyBehaviorID.Wiki: The behavior ID this enemy uses.

AttackPower.Wiki: The attack power this enemy has.

ChrType.Wiki: The character type of this enemy.

HitHeight.Wiki: The height of the enemy collision capsule. In metres.

HitRadius.Wiki: The radius of the enemy collision capsule. In metres.

Weight.Wiki: The weight of this enemy (for physics).

DynamicFriction.Wiki: The dynamic friction force used for this enemy (for physics).

StaticFriction.Wiki: The static friction force used for this enemy (for physics).

UpperDefState.Wiki: The initial state of this enemy's upper body.

ActionDefState.Wiki: The initial state of action this enemy has.

RotY_per_Second.Wiki: The rotation rate on the y-axis for this enemy. In degrees per second.

RotY_per_Second_old.Wiki: The rotation rate on the y-axis for this enemy. In degrees per second.

EnableSideStep.Wiki: If ON, the enemy can side-step left and right.

UseRagdollHit.Wiki: If ON, then ragdoll collision is used for this enemy.

stamina.Wiki: The total amount of stamina this enemy has.

staminaRecover.Wiki: The recovery rate per second for stamina this enemy uses.

staminaConsumption.Wiki: The base value of stamina consumption this enemy expends when attacking or guarding.

deffenct_Phys.Wiki: The base defense against physical damage.
